message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $11,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10,500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
